title: Russian-Speaking Attackers Target Ethereum Devs with Fake Hardhat npm Packages
description: Cybersecurity researchers have revealed several malicious packages on the npm registry that have been found impersonating the Nomic Foundation's Hardhat tool in order to steal sensitive data from developer systems.
